title: Zynga 's quarterly revenue from Q4 2012- Q3 2019
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Revenue in million U.S. dollars for 28 number of Quarters.
The Revenue in million U.S. dollars is highest at Quarter Q3 '19 and lowest at Quarter Q2 '14.
There is a difference of 192.06 between the maximum Quarter Q3 '19 and minimum Quarter Q2 '14.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Quarter in the x axis and Revenue in million U.S. dollars in the y axis.
The Revenue in million U.S. dollars is highest at Quarter Q3 '19 and lowest at Quarter Q2 '14.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Revenue in million U.S. dollars for 28 number of Quarters.
The Revenue in million U.S. dollars is highest at Quarter Q3 '19 and lowest at Quarter Q2 '14.

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Quarter in the x axis and Revenue in million U.S. dollars in the y axis.
Quarter Q3 '19 has the highest Revenue in million U.S. dollars and Q2 '14 has the lowest Revenue in million U.S. dollars.
There is a difference of 192.06 between the maximum Quarter Q3 '19 and minimum Quarter Q2 '14.
Revenue in million U.S. dollars at Quarter Q3 '19 is 345.29 , second place is Q4 '12 at 311.17, and thirdly is Q2 '19 at 306.5.
The Revenue in million U.S. dollars has lowered over the past 28 Quarters.
Considered together, the average Revenue in million U.S. dollars in all 28 Quarters is roughly 216.67.
Summing up the values of all Quarters, we get total 6066.78.
